title: New shurimian champion.

embed.description: "That power of yours was meant to destroy. You don't want to use it? Fine. Let it sink you like a stone." Those were the last words Taliyah heard from the Noxian captain before she slipped beneath the salty water, words that haunted her still.

body:
I am so looking forward to this.

An Rock girl/woman this time.
REALLY exited.

replies.body:
SHURIMA! 

loved the story. loved seeing more Yasuo. loved seeing a different view on the Emperor Azir....keen to see how it all unfolds

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aK7WuE8K,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-30T12:58:42.913+0000)
keen to see how it all unfolds

So it will be unfolding? that is good, i was worried it might be just another 'yep thats her lore, we are leaving it there for now' like Yasuo/Riven was. 

Azir wont be a slaver obviously because the lore design people aren't stupid, and that would be a very very stupid move seeming his last action is life was to make sure that no Shuriman would ever wear chains again, you'd have to completely re-write his character for it to work, and seeming Azir is one of the few champs (like Gangplank) who character is so perfectly defined by lore and other events, that changing it would be devastating.

So its common sense that he wont be, so no suspense there. 
However if this is to be a lore event it'd also be a stupid move for our little stone mage to abandon her master go on an epic journey halfway round the map just to arrive in Shurima have a chat with The emperor that goes like this:

'Oi birdface stop enslaving my people'
"what? no I'm helping them"
'but some stranger i met in a bar halfway round the world said you were a bad guy'
"Nah bro"
'oh.. okay sorry... uhhh carry on then... you uh wouldn't have a boat to ionia would you?'

because even though thats what id like to happen, its not particularly dramatic. So I'm interested to see how they make it a good story while not destroying one of the best lore related champions.

It was cool having some story revolve around Yas. Its just a shame for me personally that my second favourite champ (Yasuo) now thinks very badly about my favourite champ (Azir) which kinda sucks but oh well.

Yeah. it kinda surprised me that Yasuo was in it.
And Azir as a slave driver? plz no :( 

But Im already so hyped, I love shurima!
Please be an Earth mage support it sounds so good and sounds like it can become very different from other supports I'm feeling good about this champion.
If she isn't mid I lose 5 dollars.

Hi,

Yes I think I can say for a lot of Summoners we are thrilled too have a new Rock Type Champ.
(Pokemon Pun)

I cannot wait for more teasers and are looking forward too see what role she is. 

-RedPandaFox
